title: Matchmaking is so weird.
body:
Not a rant. Just a general observation that I find hilarious during provisionals. 
Note: These matches are my team.
Played one game. Matched with last season master tier. (win)
Played another game. Matched with last season gold and plat.
Following game. Matched with diamond/master/challenger again. 

What I find weird or hilarious is that players aren't allowed to duo between tiers 2 tiers apart. Yet my placement matches were mixed between 5 tiers. Where is the logic in this?

replies.body: The logic is in the under-populace. That's why we have Teambuilder instead of Dominion.

you mean instead of normal draft.
we have NOTHING instead of dominion.

True that.

Wait, there's normal draft in NA?

...yeah....every mode is constant on every server. except OCE. hell between 4 and 8 we only ONLY get normal blind...so BS.

but dominion, TT 3 vs 3, blind draft and TB SR....all avail 100% of the time on NA EUW EUNE russia turkey LAN1 and LAN2 and...where ever else there are servers now.
